fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Technology-related issues primarliy: data flow, data protection, digital content, telecommunications, consumer protection, copyright, etc.
goals__remit: Moonshot Strategies is an advisory firm working with technology companies and venture capital firms, advising leaders and investors on devising public policy and communications strategies, structures and teams to ensure their innovation succeeds, no matter how challenging the environment.
